quote: The US unemployment rate is 3.5% in 2024
issue: BLS data shows 2024 rates ranged from 3.7-4.2%, not 3.5%. Source: bls.gov/opub/ted/2024/unemployment-rate-changed-little-at-3-8-percent-in-march-2024.htm

quote: The US unemployment rate is 3.5% in 2024
